result.execSummary:
The defendant Randy J Poehler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-False Representation <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).
  • Theft-False Representation <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

civilJdgmts.propDescr: Civil Judgment for Restitution and Surcharges.

supervisions.notes: May transfer probation to Washington County

miscConds.notes: Restitution for Benedon's Inc., to be paid joint and several as a condition of probation. To be paid before costs and fees.
Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

No Contact with co-defendant, Steven H. or Benedon's Inc. DNA specimen was waived based on date of violation. AODA assessment and follow through with any other treatment or counseling deemed appropriate by agent. 
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: Non-working hours. Release for standard conditions. To report by 5pm on 06/13/16. May be served in Washington County, but the Court DOES NOT authorize electronic monitoring.
To perform a total of 100 hours of Community Service as a condition of probation, as directed by agent.

supervisions.notes:
Straight Time if imposed.
Consecutive to: Count 1
Probation may be transferred to Washington County. See Count 1 for additional conditions.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.
